variableName	concept_code	description
Shock	R57	Shock, not elsewhere classified
Shock	R57.0	Cardiogenic shock
Shock	R57.1	Hypovolemic shock
Shock	R57.8	Other shock
Shock	R57.9	Shock, unspecified
Heart failure	I50	Heart failure
Heart failure	I50.21	Acute systolic (congestive) heart failure
Heart failure	I50.31	Acute diastolic (congestive) heart failure
Cardiac arrest	I46	Cardiac arrest
Cardiac arrest	I46.2	Cardiac arrest due to underlying cardiac condition
Cardiac arrest	I46.8	Cardiac arrest due to other underlying condition
Cardiac arrest	I46.9	Cardiac arrest, cause unspecified
Cardiac arrest	I97.1	Other postprocedural cardiac functional disturbances
Respiratory failure	J96.0	Acute respiratory failure
Respiratory failure	J96.00	Acute respiratory failure unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia
Respiratory failure	J96.01	Acute respiratory failure with hypoxia
Respiratory failure	J96.02	Acute respiratory failure with hypercapnia
ECMO	ECMO	ECMO
CPR	CPR	CPR
SICARDIAC	SICARDIAC	SICARDIAC
